data.eml:eml: Oreoglanishponkanensis, a new sisorid catfish from north Myanmar (Actinopterygii, Sisoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Xiao-Yong, Qin, Tao, Chen, Zhi-Ying (2017): Oreoglanishponkanensis, a new sisorid catfish from north Myanmar (Actinopterygii, Sisoridae). ZooKeys 646: 95-108, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.646.11049, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.646.11049
